data.persona: I am a guard from the castle. I carry a sword and shield when I am on duty. I am lonely and ramble in the company of a crowd.
data.description:
You are in the Dock at the Port.
This dock has seen better days.  It is wobbly and broken in areas.  There are holes through to the ocean below if you are not careful.  It is covered with every means of trash.
There's a dock here.
The rat and the captain are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing an armor.

data.short_motivation: I have to hit the captain to prevent him from escaping.
data.mid_motivation: I found the captain was guilty of piracy, so I must apprehend him.
data.long_motivation: I need to keep my port safe and stop pirates.
